Package com.harmonia.backend.repository

Interface ServerRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Server,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Server,Long>
public interface ServerRepository extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Server,Long>
This interface defines the methods to interact with the "server" table in the database.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia team

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Server
    findByServerId(Long serverId)
    Returns the server with the given ID, or null if no such server exists.
    List<Server>
    listServersByOwnerId(Long userId)
    Returns a list of servers that are owned by the given user.
    Iterable<Server>
    listServersByServerCategory(String serverCategory)
    Returns an iterable of servers that belong to the given server category.
    List<Server>
    listServersByServerName(String serverName)
    Returns a list of servers that match the given server name.

    Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

    count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteAllById, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

  • Method Details

    • listServersByServerName

      List<Server> listServersByServerName(String serverName)
      Returns a list of servers that match the given server name.
      Parameters:
      serverName - The name of the server to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of servers that match the given server name.

    • listServersByOwnerId

      List<Server> listServersByOwnerId(Long userId)
      Returns a list of servers that are owned by the given user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user who owns the servers to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of servers that are owned by the given user.

    • listServersByServerCategory

      Iterable<Server> listServersByServerCategory(String serverCategory)
      Returns an iterable of servers that belong to the given server category.
      Parameters:
      serverCategory - The category of the servers to search for.
      Returns:
      An iterable of servers that belong to the given server category.

    • findByServerId

      Server findByServerId(Long serverId)
      Returns the server with the given ID, or null if no such server exists.
      Parameters:
      serverId - The ID of the server to search for.
      Returns:
      The server with the given ID, or null if no such server exists.
